item.title: Report E-2024040109
item.description:
Report E-2024040109

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-09T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-13
  • City: SAVANNAH
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that due to the product being impacted by other freight, approximately .5 teaspoon of Tufcote 3.3 PR High Solids Fast Dry Alkyd Primer - White (hazardous - UN1263) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the pallet and did not impact the trailer floor. The released product and 2 damaged cans were placed into a 30-gallon poly drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.

item.title: Report E-2024040030
item.description:
Report E-2024040030

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-04T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: KENNESAW
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 3000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On March 26, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN1219 was punctured by a forklift and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. HES personnel deployed granular absorbents to the UN1219-impacted trailer and swept them in with hand tools. All spent absorbents were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum. The damaged 55-gallon drum was overpacked into one (1) 85-gallon drum. Both drums were staged onsite for future disposal.
